entries.waypoint_description_1: This cave is the home to a branch of Duloks who call themselves the Korga tribe.
entries.player_3_1: What else do you help other than Ewoks?
entries.player_2_1: Sorry, I don't care about Ewoks.
entries.player_1_1: Sure, I'll help those little guys!
entries.npc_4_1: Oh, we've made great strides in helping the Narglatch on Naboo. We've set them up in a nice cave so they can breed without the threat of others. We've also helped a group of people learn how to raise Kimogilas on Lok. We're responsible for many, many good things in this galaxy. So, do you want to help us?
entries.npc_3_1: You're probably one of those Imperials, aren't you? It's just like an Imperial to say 'Who cares about the Ewoks?
